original_text: Joshua became very old. The Lord had let the Israelite people live safely for many years. The other nations who lived near them did not attack them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 주위의 모든 원수들로부터 이스라엘을 쉬게 하신 지 오랜 후에 여호수아가 나이 많아 늙은지라

sentences.original_text: The Lord had let the Israelite people live safely
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 이스라엘 백성이 안전하게 살도록 하셨다

sentences.original_text: The other nations who lived near them
